name: Overbooked (Jawfish)
description:
Scan and shelve books as they are returned to your library before you become overwhelmed.

Controls:

Shift/Xbox RT: Pull cart

Space/Xbox A: Place top book from cart on shelf, or throw a book

WASD/Arrows/Analog Stick: Move

Instrutions:

1. Pick up returned books from the drop box

2. Throw unscanned books onto the conveyor so they can be scanned and placed into the cart

3. Pull the cart to place scanned books into their corresponding color-coded shelves. Shelving books into the correct shelf will provide a time bonus. Shelving books into an incorrect shelf will incur a time penalty.

As your library fills with books, the return rate will increase. You will receive a time penalty every time a book fails to enter the drop box due to it being full.
